column5: Just wanted to share my experience of fishing with Paul at Fort Erie this week. On a rough day when we thought it's gonna be a nightmare of fishing Paul was able to find some good spots and we never left disappointed. In just 4 hours on a water we were able to catch some good size bass and good eating size as well. In total we got 8 bass among 2 of us, ranging from 2- 4.10 pounds (most of them were close to 4). I can't imagine what could have caught had we had better conditions. Anyone who wants to go for a sure catch, I'd recommend Paul as a guide and you'd enjoy a company of a great guy too. Thanks Paul!
WOW, congradulations on the big bass you caught!
sweet. looks nice out there for erie

Good ones!  Was Fort Erie really that rough? We had maybe 3 footers in the afternoon but nothing too bad. We found some fish yesterday as well. Never nailed any 4+ but a couple were pushing 3 anyway. We made up for it in numbers.. no idea how many we caught, my arms hurt from catching so many.  They were hitting minnow imitations, 3" crawfish tubes, random crankbaits and even got a few on my beloved spinnerbaits.

Thank you for the kind words! This trip was back on October 10th. The water was dirty from the high winds the day before. We fished for a half day, tough bite, strong east winds, but great company in the boat  The 4.10 was a really nice smallmouth
Great report and pics audio_mad Some real nice looking bronze backs  If I lived in that area..... I'd sure give Paul a call  Thanks for sharing Leechman
haha i live in montreal and this fall will be my second time out with paul for steelies and it wont be my last thats for sure!!!
Paul is the man!  He always finds the fish!
nice report..Paul is a great guy to spend the day with out there..he will find the fish, and have a blast doing it.

Great day on the water !!! some very impressive smallies for sure,and paul is a great guy as well as a great fisherman too,he fishes the niagara river almost everyday of the year,the guy is a machine,he never puts his boat away !!!
